executable.title: ChangeTracker Command-line
executable.description: ChangeTracker command-line module description and help.

image.name: tgOutput
image.label: Output image
image.description: Result of the processing. The output depends on the selection of the termination step. If the complete workflow is run, the output will be the final analysis image. If both intensity- and deformation-based analyses are requested, only intensity-based results are saved.

boolean.name: tgIntensityAnalysisFlag
boolean.label: Analyze Intensity Pattern
boolean.description: Growth Metric is based on changes in the the local intensity patterns

boolean.name: tgDeformableAnalysisFlag
boolean.label: Analyze Deformation Map
boolean.description: Growth Metric is based on deformation map between scan1 and scan2

boolean.name: saveResultsLog
boolean.label: Save results log
boolean.description: If set, the results of the analysis will be saved in the working directory in the file AnalysisOutcome.log

integer-vector.name: tgROIMin
integer-vector.description: Lower extent of region of interest
integer-vector.label: ROI Min

integer-vector.name: tgROIMax
integer-vector.description: Upper extent of region of interest
integer-vector.label: ROI Max

integer-vector.name: tgThreshold
integer-vector.description: Intensity threshold defining tumor in scan 1
integer-vector.label: Threshold

double.name: tgSensitivity
double.description: Sensitivity Parameter (between 0 and 1) - only relevant for 'Analyze Intensity Pattern'
double.label: Threshold

integer.name: TerminationStep
integer.label: TerminationStep
integer.description: Specifies the stage of the implementation after which the code saves the output and terminates (mostly for testing purposes). 0 value instructs to run the complete analysis workflow.
